alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 15 at 1:48AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected within the Virgin River Gorge along Interstate 15. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Arizona, including the following county, Mohave. * WHEN...Until 345 AM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Rises in small streams and normally dry washes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 146 AM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms has ended within the Virgin River Gorge. Minor flooding is likely still ongoing in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Virgin River Gorge and Virgin River Campground. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
